TopicTitle: Latest update to ruin test scores worldwide?

Articles.Content:
I don't know about you... but I'll be too busy doing orbital mechanics to study literature or calculus

Will this latest update impact your final exam scores too?

Yep, finals. I've rationalized my studies/writing as a way to pass the time until my favorite mods update.

Still managed to procrastinate the entire day anyway.
Luckily, my finals aren't until early January. And why on Earth would I start studying now? Let's see where that talk gets me in college.
Ksp why must you ruin my grades, why!!!!!!!!!
I already had my finals, i feel saved (?).
Meh. Number 5's answer WAS ISP and you all know it!
